about_the_game:
From Video Game Composer Tim Calos, Everafter Falls (Original Game Soundtrack) features the cozy tones you come to love from adorable farming sims, mixed perfectly with tension-filled crescendos as you uncover sinister mystery and slip back into your life among your furry friends. With an ear towards chiptune classics from the NES days, modern ambiences from other farming sims, and best in the business soundscapes to set the perfect mood, Everafter Falls' soundtrack is just as hand-crafted as the game from Square Husky.

The OST is comprised of 24 tracks, producing around an hour-long experience taking you from Atlas' pond, to the dungeons down below, to the Tree of Seasons just outside town. With a song for every season, every event, every different gameplay mood, the Everafter Falls Soundtrack reflects the attitudes of everyone in the quiet, country town.
